name: Dual Gravity
description:
This is a game made for the Full Moon Game Jam in February 2019 with the theme DUALITY.

Move with A, D or Left and Right arrow-keys

F for flipping gravity

G for Moving blocks

Enjoy!

Our game seems to take a bit of a performance hit when played in the browser so we have provided fat clients for those who wish it.

Credits 

Graphics, design and effects  Carl Linné

Code, design and effects Lukas Isaksson

Sound effects: 

lowRandom.ogg - Kenney (kenney.nl) 

rumble.ogg (changes were made) - Michel Baradari (https://opengameart.org/content/rumbleexplosion)

boneImpact.ogg - Blender Foundation (https://opengameart.org/content/bone-fall-ledge-climbing-impact-yo-frankie)

Music: 

spacecave.wav - Aron Ben Elal (https://opengameart.org/users/iamoneabe) License: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/
